songs.title: Super Bass (Cover)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Jesy]
Boy you got my heartbeat, running away

[Verse 1: Leigh-Anne & Jesy & All]
This is for the boys with booming system
Top down AC with the cooling system
When he come in the club he be blazing up
He got stacks on the deck like he saving up
And he ill, he real, he might got a deal
He pop bottle and he got the right kinda build
So shy and I’m loving his tie
He’s slicker than the guy with the thing in his eyes, oh

[Refrain (Perrie) & (Jade) & All & Leigh-Anne]
(Yes I did, yes I did)
{Somebody please tell him}
Who the F I is, Rythmix
Back the coupes up, back deuce up and chuck deuce up

[Chorus: All & Jade]
Boy you got my heartbeat running away
Beating like a drum and it’s coming your way
Can’t you hear that boom, badoom, boom
Boom, badoom, boom, bass
He got that superbass
Boom, badoom, boom, boom, badoom, boom bass
He got that superbass
Boom badoom, bass, bass, bass
Boom badoom, bass, bass, bass
Can’t you hear that boom, badoom, boom
Boom, badoom, boom, bass
He got that superbass
Boom, badoom, boom
Boom, badoom, boom, bass, yeah

[Bridge: All & Perrie]
See I need you in my life for me to stay
No, no, no, no, no, I know you’ll stay
No, no, no, no, no, don’t go away, hey
Can’t you hear that, ha ha
Can’t you hear that, ha ha
Can’t you hear that, ha ha
Can’t you hear that, woo

[Verse 2: Leigh-Anne]
Yeah, it’s that superbass that keeps me hasty, boy
I won’t be losing faith
It’s the rhythm of the bass inside of me
Leading me to you, it’s escaping me
My heart's been beating over time
It’s going through the point of a zambumbwein
Beat is a racing, mind is pacing
Superbasses keeps me places

[Chorus: All & Jade]
Boy you got my heartbeat running away
Beating like a drum and it’s coming your way
Can’t you hear that boom, badoom, boom
Boom, badoom, boom, bass
He got that superbass
Boom, badoom, boom, boom, badoom, boom bass
Boy you got my heartbeat running away
Beating like a drum and it’s coming your way
Can’t you hear that boom, badoom, boom
Boom, badoom, boom, bass
He got that superbass
Boom, badoom, boom, boom, badoom, boom bass
